nodes.bodyText: Why pass this separately and not use SingleWorkerOptions value for taskListActivitiesPerSecond? https://github.com/temporalio/temporal-java-sdk/blob/master/src/main/java/io/temporal/internal/worker/SingleWorkerOptions.java#L45
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,11 +39,14 @@ public SyncActivityWorker(
       WorkflowServiceStubs service,
       String namespace,
       String taskList,
+      double taskListActivitiesPerSecond,

nodes.bodyText: Good catch. Removed taskListActivitiesPerSecond from SinglePollerOptions as they don't apply to the workflow worker.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,11 +39,14 @@ public SyncActivityWorker(
       WorkflowServiceStubs service,
       String namespace,
       String taskList,
+      double taskListActivitiesPerSecond,
